title: Hrithik Roshan: An angry Hrithik Roshan blasts a popular apparel brand for using his kids' picture without his permission | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

organizations.name: hindi movie news - times of india

text:
Hrithik Roshan has lashed out at an international apparel brand for misusing a picture featuring his boys, Hridaan and Hrehaan. The actor took to Twitter to call out the popular label accusing them of wrongly using his picture without his permission, to promote their brand. The picture shared by Hrithik sees the 'Kaabil' actor flanked by his kids Hridaan and Hrehaan , mid-air, attempting to jump in a lush garden. 

‘Kaabil’ worldwide box office collection: Hrithik Roshan starrer performs well overseas Hrithik Roshan’s suspense thriller ‘Kaabil’ continues to do well at the domestic and worldwide box office. 
The said picture has a message promoting the brand's Spring/Summer 2017 collection. The message on the picture reads, "Play On! Young, Fun & On The Run. The New Season Has Just Launched. Adorable Hridaan and Hreehan in Tommy Hilfer Kids." 

Hrithik shared the picture to his Twitter page with an angry message, "Dear Tommy.I dont wear u, neither do my kids endorse u.If u hv lost ur spine I hv a great team 2help u find it.Please (hil)figure urself out."
